recipe.title: Lemon Sorbetto with Watermelon and Anisette
ingredients: 1 pint lemon sorbetto (sorbet) or Italian ice
instructions: Stir together anisette and sugar in a large bowl. Using melon-ball cutter, scoop watermelon balls into bowl. Add mint and toss. Serve sorbetto with watermelon mixture.
